title: Why did Riot mess up League?
body: Why did they remove Teambuilder? Seems like a step in the wrong direction at this moment. There was nothing wrong with Teambuilder that I could see so why fix something that's not broken?

replies.body: cause its riot and your opinions dont matter

> [{quoted}](name=Scientiendo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qE1cJYNB,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-15T01:23:42.860+0000)
>
> Why did they remove Teambuilder? Seems like a step in the wrong direction at this moment. There was nothing wrong with Teambuilder that I could see so why fix something that's not broken?

There was plenty wrong with teambuilder.
Riot has a strange habit of removing perfectly functional things when they get a new idea, like champion kits and teambuilder.
They didn't try to "fix" it, they're going to replace it.

There is a Rioter that said there will be a New Champ Select option later on that is a better version of TB.  So its just going to be re-skinned with the option to pick a balanced team comp.  Right now, they are just testing NCS in NA to get it ready for the Ranked season.
Title should be why did Riot remove Teambuilder.
